stimulusHtml: A converging lens is used to form a real image of an object placed outside the focal point of the lens. Which of the following would increase the size of the real image?
choicesHtml: Moving the object closer to the lens but keeping it outside the focal point
Moving the object to a position inside the focal point
Moving the lens farther from the object
Replacing the lens with one in the same position with the same focal length but a greater diameter
Replacing the lens with one in the same position with the same diameter but a smaller focal length
